text:
How it works
Every pie is handmade with love, crafted with care, and baked using only high-quality Swiss ingredients. Each pie is about 24 cm in diameter and serves 6â€“10 people â€” depending, of course, on how generous the slices are.
Orders can be picked up in Wallisellen, or delivery within the ZÃ¼rich area may be arranged. Because every pie and dessert is made from scratch â€” from resting the dough to letting the filling set â€” please allow at least 3 daysâ€™ notice for your order.
Please note: the order will be initialised only when payment has been done. If youâ€™d like a custom order or have troubles with the payment with Twint, please contact me directly at hello@flakypieshop.com

About
Hi, Iâ€™m Marianna ðŸ‘‹
Iâ€™m a researcher by profession â€” and a pastry chef by heart.
Originally from Italy, I trained and became certified in professional pastry before moving to Switzerland in 2016 to pursue my research career. Growing up, I spent much of my childhood travelling through the USA, where I fell in love with flaky American pies, cookies, and all things sweet.
Now, as a new mom, Iâ€™ve opened a small microbakery from my home â€” a space where I can share my love for pastry while spending precious time with my baby.

Jeder Pie wird mit Liebe von Hand gemacht â€“ mit Sorgfalt, Zeit und hochwertigen Schweizer Zutaten.
